verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Hew <S%H6458><s%> you two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like to the first: <S%H7223><s%> and I will write <S%H3789><s%> on these tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were in the first <S%H7223><s%> tables, <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you brake. <S%H7665><s%>

And be ready <S%H3559><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and come <S%H5927><s%> up in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and present <S%H5324><s%> yourself there <S%H8033><s%> to me in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> up with you, neither <S%H408><s%> let any man <S%H376><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the mount; <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> let the flocks <S%H6629><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> herds <S%H1241><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> that mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And he hewed <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like to the first; <S%H7223><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up to mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, and took <S%H3947><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone. <S%H68><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and stood <S%H3320><s%> with him there, <S%H8033><s%> and proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> by before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and proclaimed, <S%H7121><s%> The LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> long-suffering, <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in goodness <S%H2617><s%> and truth, <S%H571><s%>

Keeping <S%H5341><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> for thousands, <S%H505><s%> forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression <S%H6588><s%> and sin, <S%H2402><s%> and that will by no <S%H3808><s%> means clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty; visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children, <S%H1121><s%> and on the children's <S%H1121><s%> children, to the third <S%H8029><s%> and to the fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made haste, <S%H4422><s%> and bowed <S%H6915><s%> his head toward the earth, <S%H776><s%> and worshipped. <S%H7812><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> O LORD, <S%H136><s%> let my LORD, <S%H136><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, go <S%H3212><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us; for it is a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> and pardon <S%H5545><s%> our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and our sin, <S%H2403><s%> and take us for your inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant: <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> marvels, <S%H6381><s%> such as have not been done <S%H1254><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> nor in any <S%H3605><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are shall see <S%H7200><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for it is a terrible <S%H3372><s%> thing that I will do <S%H6213><s%> with you.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> you that which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I drive <S%H1644><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> you the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourself, lest <S%H6435><s%> you make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you go, <S%H935><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> it be for a snare <S%H4170><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you:
But you shall destroy <S%H5422><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> break <S%H7665><s%> their images, <S%H4676><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> down their groves: <S%H842><s%>

For you shall worship <S%H7812><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> god: <S%H410><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jealous, <S%H7067><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God: <S%H410><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> you make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and they go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> and do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> and one call <S%H7121><s%> you, and you eat <S%H398><s%> of his sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%>

And you take <S%H3947><s%> of their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> and make your sons <S%H1121><s%> go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods. <S%H430><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> molten <S%H4541><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

The feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread shall you keep. <S%H8104><s%> Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, in the time <S%H4150><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib: <S%H24><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%> you came <S%H3318><s%> out from Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that opens <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%> is mine; and every <S%H3605><s%> firstling <S%H6363><s%> among your cattle, <S%H4735><s%> whether ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep, <S%H7716><s%> that is male. <S%H2142><s%>

But the firstling <S%H6363><s%> of an ass <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb: <S%H7716><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you redeem <S%H6299><s%> him not, then shall you break <S%H6202><s%> his neck. <S%H6203><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall redeem. <S%H6299><s%> And none <S%H3808><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty. <S%H7387><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall work, <S%H4399><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest: <S%H7673><s%> in ripening <S%H2758><s%> time and in harvest <S%H7105><s%> you shall rest. <S%H7673><s%>

And you shall observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks, <S%H7620><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering <S%H614><s%> at the year's <S%H8141><s%> end. <S%H8622><s%>

Thrice <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> your male children <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For I will cast <S%H3423><s%> out the nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your borders: <S%H1366><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any man <S%H376><s%> desire <S%H2530><s%> your land, <S%H776><s%> when you shall go <S%H5927><s%> up to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> thrice <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the year. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall not offer <S%H7819><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leaven; <S%H2557><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%> be left <S%H3885><s%> to the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not seethe <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother's <S%H517><s%> milk. <S%H2461><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> you these <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> for after <S%H5921><s%> the tenor <S%H6310><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you and with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he was there <S%H8033><s%> with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> he did neither <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%> And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> on the tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments. <S%H1697><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Moses' <S%H4872><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> when he came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount, <S%H2022><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%> while he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone; <S%H7160><s%> and they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> to come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to them; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to him: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with them.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near: <S%H5066><s%> and he gave them in commandment <S%H6680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
And till Moses <S%H4872><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them, he put <S%H5414><s%> a veil <S%H4533><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%>

But when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> with him, he took <S%H5493><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> off, until <S%H5704><s%> he came <S%H3318><s%> out. And he came <S%H3318><s%> out, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> he was commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of Moses' <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> shone: <S%H7160><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H7725><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he went <S%H935><s%> in to speak <S%H1696><s%> with him.
